name: rosbag_to_csv
short_description: Convert data in rosbag files to CSV.
description:
This Action converts data in rosbag files (.bag) to CSV.

By default, all topics will be extracted from the input file(s). You can use the parameter to extract specific topics. This helps to reduce the size of the resulting file.

parameters.name: TOPICS
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of topics to extract. Don't use image topics.
